string.name: proguardtext
string.string:
ProGuard makes the following impact on our project
 1. Minify(reduce,decrease,shorten)the code /n It reduces the size of the application.
 2.Obfuscate(shade ,black out) /n It removes the unused classes and methods that contribute to the 64K method counts limit of an Android application.
 3.Optimize the code 
 It makes the application difficult to reverse engineer by obfuscating the code.
